name: Bullet Barry: assualt on anti consumerism
name_original: Bullet Barry: assualt on anti consumerism
description:
this is a fan game for my favourite youtuber called bullet barry https://www.youtube.com/channel/UCu0sLdOcxsr3de-Cw...

this is also my first game so any criticism is welcome as long as its not to make fun of me but anyway hope you enjoy

story : everybody has been turned into pc elitists and console peasants by Microsoft and now its down to bullet barry to bring them all back down to earth and defeat Microsoft

plans : I'm planning to add extra levels in the future

easter egg hints : (great again) (zombiecatartist)
